en.title: Safely Store your Recovery Phrase
en.title_reset: Safely Store your new Recovery Phrase
en.header: If you lose access to your devices, you will need your recovery phrase to access your accounts. Save this somewhere safe and private.
en.header_reset: Once you complete these steps, the recovery phrase below will replace your current phrase.
en.store_your_recovery_phrase: Did you store your recovery phrase? You will need to re-enter it in the next step.
en.i_have_stored_phrase: I have safely stored my recovery phrase.
